SAVE_PATH_FILE - Static variable in class model.Game
 
saveWinners() - Method in class model.Game
This method serializes or saves all the information about the winner of each round in the game.
score - Variable in class model.Winner
 
searchPlayer(char) - Method in class model.Square
This method searches the player in the current square.
searchPlayer(Player, char) - Method in class model.Square
This method searches the player in the linked list of players of the current square.
searchPlayer(String, char, int, int) - Method in class ui.Menu
This method verifies that a certain symbol isn't repeated (that another player has the same) in the whole text string.
searchPlayerInSquare(char, Square, Square) - Method in class model.Grid
This method searches the square that contains the player.
searchSquare(int, int, Square) - Method in class model.Grid
This method searches the square according to specified coordinates.
searchSquareByNumber(int, Square, Square) - Method in class model.Grid
This method searches the square by its square number.
searchSymbol(String, char, int, int) - Method in class model.Game
This method searches for a specific symbol within the text string that contains the symbols of the other players.
serialVersionUID - Static variable in class model.Winner
 
setDown(Square) - Method in class model.Square
This method sets the respective down square in the linked matrix of squares.
setFinalLadder(Square) - Method in class model.Square
This method sets the square where the ladder ends in the linked matrix of squares.
setFinalSnake(Square) - Method in class model.Square
This method sets the square where the snake ends in the linked matrix of squares.
setGrid(Grid) - Method in class model.Game
This method modifies the board game.
setLadder(int) - Method in class model.Square
This method sets the ladder in the square.
setLeft(Winner) - Method in class model.Winner
This method modifies the element to the left of a winning player in the binary tree.
setMovements(int) - Method in class model.Player
This method sets the number of movements of the player.
setNext(Player) - Method in class model.Player
This method sets the next player in the linked list.
setNext(Square) - Method in class model.Square
This method sets the respective next square in the linked matrix of squares.
setNum(int) - Method in class model.Square
This method sets the number of the square on the grid.
setParent(Winner) - Method in class model.Winner
This method modifies the parent element of a winning player in the binary tree.
setPrev(Player) - Method in class model.Player
This method sets the previous player in the linked list.
setPrev(Square) - Method in class model.Square
This method sets the respective previous square in the linked matrix of squares.
setRight(Winner) - Method in class model.Winner
This method modifies the element to the right of a winning player in the binary tree.
setSnake(char) - Method in class model.Square
This method sets the snake in the square.
setUp(Square) - Method in class model.Square
This method sets the respective upper square in the linked matrix of squares.
setWinnerRoot(Winner) - Method in class model.Game
This method modifies the root of the binary tree of winners.
showGameBoard() - Method in class ui.Menu
This method displays the board throughout the game and allows the user to enter commands such as num, simul or menu.
showGrid() - Method in class ui.Menu
This method displays the game board with the players, snakes, leaders and boxes listed.
showPositionsBoard() - Method in class ui.Menu
This method displays the leaderboard of winners according to their score.
showSimul() - Method in class ui.Menu
This method allows the game to run automatically without waiting for a line break by the user and within two seconds between each move.
snake - Variable in class model.Square
 
Square - Class in model
This class contains attributes, relationships, and methods of a square.
Square(int, int) - Constructor for class model.Square
This is the constructor of the class.
startGame(int, int, int, int, String) - Method in class model.Game
This method creates a game board depending on the information provided.
startGame() - Method in class ui.Menu
This method allows the user to enter the text string that contains all the information about the game (number of rows and columns of the board, plus the snakes, ladders and players).
